subject: Pedal Control box
description_text:
Hey good morning,
 It looks like hub box needs to be replaced because it seems the brake port has shorted out. It is sparking when I plug it in the plug a few times. I also tried plugging the brake plug into the throttle port and it came on. So I believe it’s the hub box that will need to be replaced. 

It also might be the reason the haptics don’t work either because every time I plug it in, it makes the pedals malfunction and turn off and on repeatedly. 

Again thanks for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi Bobby Holton,  Sure — we will send you a new hub/control box. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and full shipping address. Also, please open the hub box, remove the PCB, and send us clear high-resolution photos of both sides of the board. I will review them to check for any possible short circuits, poor solder joints, or connector issues.
